required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of Ultrasound Bone Strength Device to Measure Calcaneal Bone Strength Index of Human Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Open-Labeled, Self-Paired Study to Examine the Effectiveness and Safety of Ultrasound Bone Strength Device Used for Measuring Calcaneal Bone Strength Index of Human Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

clinical_study.source: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to examine whether ultrasound bone strength device (Model Number: Oste-scan 500A) is effective and safe in measuring calcaneal bone strength index of human subjects, compared with a listed, similar device (Model Number: SONOST3000).

detailed_description.textblock: This study adopt a method of multicenter, open-labeled, self-paired design. Each subject will be randomly assigned to two different detective sequence groups. In one group, the investigators will detect the same calcaneus of each subject by experimental ultrasound bone strength device firstly and then by control device. In another group, the investigators will detect the same calcaneus of each subject by control ultrasound bone strength device firstly and then by experimental device. Experimental ultrasound bone strength device is developed by Wuxi Huajian Hengchuang Medical Equipment Science and Technology Co., Ltd.. This device's model number is Oste-scan 500A and report number is Z-Y-2009-2014, Z-E-0530-2014(G). Control ultrasound bone strength device which has same clinical indications and action mechanism with the experimental one, is manufactured by Osteosys Co., Ltd.. This device's model number is SONOST3000.

primary_outcome.measure: the consistent rate of bone mineral density diagnosis
primary_outcome.description: Calculating the consistent rate with data measured by two devices to evaluate the consistent rate of bone mineral density diagnosis.

secondary_outcome.measure: the accuracy of speed of sound(SOS)
secondary_outcome.description: SOS values measured by two devices will be tested by Paired T Test and Wilcoxon Signed Rank Test to evaluate the difference. In addition, calculating correlation coefficient and concordance correlation coefficient of SOS values measured by two devices to evaluate correlation and concordance of two devices.

secondary_outcome.measure: the accuracy of broadband ultrasound attenuation(BUA), stiffness(SI), T-scores and Z-scores
secondary_outcome.description: Plotting monotonicity curves of BUA values, SI values, T-scores and Z-scores of two devices to evaluate the correlation of two devices.

secondary_outcome.measure: the using performance evaluation index of the device, including function, stability and convenience
secondary_outcome.time_frame: during detection and 0-24 hours after detection
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluating the using performance evaluation index of the device, including function, stability and convenience.

secondary_outcome.measure: vital signs, including respiration, heart rate, blood pressure and temperature
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before detection, during detection and 0-24 hours after detection
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs, including respiration, heart rate, blood pressure and temperature will be observed and recorded before detection, during detection and 0-24 hours after detection.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before detection, during detection and 0-24 hours after detection
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical symptoms will be observed and recorded before detection, during detection and 0-24 hours after detection.

secondary_outcome.measure: skin allergy caused by the device
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before detection, during detection and 0-24 hours after detection
secondary_outcome.description: Skin allergy caused by the device will be observed and recorded before detection, during detection and 0-24 hours after detection.

secondary_outcome.measure: the number of participants with adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse events appeared in the entire trial will be recorded.

arm_group.description: In this group, the investigators will measure calcaneal bone strength index of each subject by experimental device firstly and then by control device.
In this group, the investigators will measure calcaneal bone strength index of each subject by control device firstly and then by experimental device.

intervention.description: The investigators will detect the same calcaneus of each subject by experimental ultrasound bone strength device. Experimental ultrasound bone strength device's model number is Oste-scan 500A and report number is Z-Y-2009-2014, Z-E-0530-2014(G).
The investigators will detect the same calcaneus of each subject by control ultrasound bone strength device. Control ultrasound bone strength device's model number is SONOST3000.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject who need to measure calcaneal bone strength index.
- Subject is a male or female subject 20-80 years of age.
- Subject is willing and able to provide signed and dated written informed consent form.
- Subject whose compliance is good and can cooperate to complete the clinical trial.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject whose heel skin fester or defect.
- Subject has a history of allergic reactions to ultrasonic coupling agent.
- Subject who is not cooperative obviously or nervous extremely.
- Pregnant or lactating females.
- Subject has a mental disease, without self-control.
- Subject has participated in other clinical trial within a month.

overall_official.affiliation: Office Director of Clinical Trial Institution

responsible_party.investigator_title: Office Director of Clinical Trial Institution
